meanings.definition: A structural unit of a myofibril in striated muscle, consisting of a dark band and the nearer half of each adjacent pale band.
meanings.sent1: The sarcomeres are like building blocks in muscle fibers.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study sarcomeres to understand muscle structure better.
meanings.sent3: The sarcomeres in the muscle were having a party, with the dark bands as the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the alignment of sarcomeres in a muscle.
meanings.sent5: The gym teacher explained how sarcomeres contract to make muscles move.

meanings.definition: A segment of a myofibril in striated muscle fiber.
meanings.sent1: During exercise, the sarcomeres shorten to make the muscle contract.
meanings.sent2: Athletes focus on strengthening their sarcomeres for better performance.
meanings.sent3: The sarcomeres in the muscle fiber were racing each other to see who could contract faster.
meanings.sent4: The unity among team members was as tight as the alignment of sarcomeres in a muscle fiber.
meanings.sent5: The textbook illustration vividly showed how sarcomeres are arranged in muscle fibers.
